title: (x) beautiful serif text face - DeVinne {Patricia}
content:
Hi,

I cam across this typeface .. and its really looks classy to me.  
What is this typeface? Can anyone help?

Thanks in advance  
S Ray

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [IMG\_1555.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20070212184158/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_1555.jpg) | 299.55 KB |
author: ssray123

comments.content: It looks a lot like Monotype Modern to me.

Reminded me of this recent thread.

[http://typophile.com/node/30542](http://web.archive.org/web/20070212184158/http:/typophile.com/node/30542)
[Miller](http://web.archive.org/web/20070212184158/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Miller) might be a good alternative since this appears to be metal type.

I agree with Patty. I think a few letters such as the ‘f’ and ‘K’ match [DeVinne](http://web.archive.org/web/20070212184158/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/de-vinne/) better than they do Monotype Modern.

- Mike Yanega
